aboveTheFold.title: Better Attribution for Inventory
aboveTheFold.description: Leverage onchain technology to tokenize inventory ensuring ownership and transparency while unlocking working capital for the business.

details.title: No-Code Tools to Tokenize Inventory
details.description: Create digital records of inventory and assets onchain to ensure secure and transparent distribution and trading

blockchainOwnership.title: Blockchain Backed Ownership
blockchainOwnership.description: Transform goods into tokenized assets that are secured onchain for tamper-proof ownership.

simplifyingTokenization.title: Simplifying Tokenization
simplifyingTokenization.description: Easily tokenize luxury collectibles, physical items and other assets with NFT technology that enables custody ownership for distribution.

globalTrading.title: Global Trading & Liquidity
globalTrading.description: Unlock new global markets by making tokenized inventory tradable, increasing liquidity and reach with value-add partners and businesses.

secureCustody.title: Secure Custody and Ownership
secureCustody.description: Work with trusted custodians to securely store assets with the tokenized product records for onchain ownership and availability.

transparentRecords.title: Transparent and Immutable Records
transparentRecords.description: Tokenization ensures all relevant product information, transaction history and ownership are stored immutably for accurate attribution.

simpleTransfers.title: Simple and Secure Transfers
simpleTransfers.description: Send and trade tokenized physical and digital items across platforms with onchain transparency to ensure trust between parties.

digitalRepresentation.title: Digital Representation of Inventory
digitalRepresentation.description: Tokenization allows you to create records representing inventory to enhancing traceability and secure ownership onchain.

transparency.title: Enhanced Transparency
transparency.description: All details involved with the inventory from transaction history to product metadata are stored onchain to display to 3rd parties.

marketAccess.title: Global Market Access
marketAccess.description: Tokenized assets can be traded globally to further unlock new market opportunities by adding liquidity for existing inventory.

custodianship.title: Secure Custodianship
custodianship.description: Inventory can be securely stored by trusted third parties while ownership records can be traded until the rightful owner claims possession of the item.

efficiency.title: Increased Efficiency in Ownership Transfer
efficiency.description: Instantly transfer ownership to reduce the time and cost associated with traditional methods of transferring inventory.
